meanings.definition: The quality of being impetuous or characterized by sudden or rash action.
meanings.sent1: Her impetuosity often led her to make quick decisions without thinking them through.
meanings.sent2: His impetuosity in spending money without considering the consequences got him into financial trouble.
meanings.sent3: The impetuosity of the puppy running around the house knocked over a vase.
meanings.sent4: The impetuosity of the storm caused trees to sway violently in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The impetuosity of the toddler running towards the street made the mother gasp in fear.
